description: This file defines the main React component for the Rides page in a carpool management system. It manages the creation, listing, and cancellation of ride offers and requests, integrating with backend APIs and user notifications.

methods.name: reload
methods.description: Fetches latest ride meta, offers, and requests from the backend API, updating component state and handling errors.

methods.name: onOfferCreated
methods.description: Callback invoked when a new ride offer is created; updates the offers list and shows a success notification.

methods.name: onRequestCreated
methods.description: Callback invoked when a new ride request is created; updates the requests list and shows a success notification.

methods.name: onCancelOffer
methods.description: Handles cancellation of a ride offer by calling the API and updating state; shows notifications based on success or failure.

methods.name: onCancelRequest
methods.description: Handles cancellation of a ride request by calling the API, refetching offers, and updating state; includes error handling.

methods.name: onConfirmRequest
methods.description: Confirms a ride request with a specific offer, updates the requests and offers lists, and triggers notifications.
